subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady threw three touchdowns and extended his streak of attempts without an interception to 319 — topping the N.F.L. mark of 308 set by Bernie Kosar with Cleveland in the 1990-91 seasons.
snippet: Tom Brady threw three touchdowns and extended his streak of attempts without an interception to 319 — topping the N.F.L. mark of 308 set by Bernie Kosar with Cleveland in the 1990-91 seasons.
